passages.name: Intro
passages.text:
**space
Stars far ahead are shining bright. @eon_float_eagle
Sun is behind, but Eon can still feel it's warmth.
She thinks it's just a perfect day to float in the void.
[[Eagle|Friend]]
passages.cleanText:
**space
Stars far ahead are shining bright. @eon_float_eagle
Sun is behind, but Eon can still feel it's warmth.
She thinks it's just a perfect day to float in the void.

passages.name: Friend
passages.text:
**hi
She spots a familiar face far ahead. @eon_hi_eagle
Eon: Hey! Hey! Omolon! Is that you?
Silence for a moment. It takes a little bit for the sound waves to travel.
Omolon: Yo! Eon! Good to see ya sister! How have you been?
[[Eagle|Same]]
passages.cleanText:
**hi
She spots a familiar face far ahead. @eon_hi_eagle
Eon: Hey! Hey! Omolon! Is that you?
Silence for a moment. It takes a little bit for the sound waves to travel.
Omolon: Yo! Eon! Good to see ya sister! How have you been?

passages.name: Same
passages.text:
**dialog
Eon: Ah, nothing much changed. Same old things. How about you? @eon_float_eagle
Silence again.
Omolon: Same! Just traveling here and there. It's been ages right? 
Eon: Yes, I know. It sucks to be so much out of control sometimes.
[[Eagle|News]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Eon: Ah, nothing much changed. Same old things. How about you? @eon_float_eagle
Silence again.
Omolon: Same! Just traveling here and there. It's been ages right? 
Eon: Yes, I know. It sucks to be so much out of control sometimes.

passages.name: Wonderful
passages.text:
**heart
Eon: Oh yea, that would've been wonderful! @eon_happy_ox
Eon realizes that the silence inbetween the conversation is getting shorter. Omolon is getting closer to her.
Eon: Unfortunately it seems like we're going into opposite directions.
[[Ox|Idea]]
passages.cleanText:
**heart
Eon: Oh yea, that would've been wonderful! @eon_happy_ox
Eon realizes that the silence inbetween the conversation is getting shorter. Omolon is getting closer to her.
Eon: Unfortunately it seems like we're going into opposite directions.

passages.name: Unlikely
passages.text:
**dialog
Eon acknowledges that they are lonely beings by existence.
Eon: Well, you know that is quite unlikely that we both travel to the same direction.
Silence.
Omolon: Yea, we are just slaves of the forces. Dang!
[[Eagle|Farewell]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Eon acknowledges that they are lonely beings by existence.
Eon: Well, you know that is quite unlikely that we both travel to the same direction.
Silence.
Omolon: Yea, we are just slaves of the forces. Dang!

passages.name: News
passages.text:
**explosion
Eon: Well, we probably don't have much time. Anything new that I should be aware of? @eon_surprised_eagle
Omolon: Oh yea, remember Jepara?
Eon: Yes. What about her?
Omolon: Well, she crashed herself into a planet.
[[Eagle|Restarters]]
passages.cleanText:
**explosion
Eon: Well, we probably don't have much time. Anything new that I should be aware of? @eon_surprised_eagle
Omolon: Oh yea, remember Jepara?
Eon: Yes. What about her?
Omolon: Well, she crashed herself into a planet.

passages.name: Restarters
passages.text:
**brokenHeart
Eon: Oh that sucks...You mean, she did that intentionally? @eon_confused_eagle
Omolon: Yes. And no. I think she was influenced by the restarters movement.
Eon: You mean, the folks who believe that there is life after crashing on a planet.
Omolon: Yes! She was exhausted by the constant dragging and floating. I mean, I can't blame her. But I'd say it sound kind of nonsensical to believe that she'll restart a new life by destroying herself.
[[Eagle|Observing]]
[[Ox|Similar]]
passages.cleanText:
**brokenHeart
Eon: Oh that sucks...You mean, she did that intentionally? @eon_confused_eagle
Omolon: Yes. And no. I think she was influenced by the restarters movement.
Eon: You mean, the folks who believe that there is life after crashing on a planet.
Omolon: Yes! She was exhausted by the constant dragging and floating. I mean, I can't blame her. But I'd say it sound kind of nonsensical to believe that she'll restart a new life by destroying herself.

passages.name: Observing
passages.text:
**questionMark
Eon is heartbroken but at the same time she is not really convinced that Jepara made a bad decision. @eon_disagree_eagle
Eon: I have to say, We don't really know if she is actually dead though, right? Because we can't really get close enough to a planet to observe whether her plan worked or not.
Omolon has a suspicious look on her face.
Omolon: So...You're saying they might be right?
[[Eagle|Proof]]
passages.cleanText:
**questionMark
Eon is heartbroken but at the same time she is not really convinced that Jepara made a bad decision. @eon_disagree_eagle
Eon: I have to say, We don't really know if she is actually dead though, right? Because we can't really get close enough to a planet to observe whether her plan worked or not.
Omolon has a suspicious look on her face.
Omolon: So...You're saying they might be right?

passages.name: Idea
passages.text:
**questionMark
Omolon: Yea... Hey, just putting it out there but... What if I'd go into that planet's orbit to turn back towards your direction? @eon_unhappy_ox
Eon doesn't like that idea at all.
Eon: I think it's just too risky. You might end up crashing the planet instead.
[[Ox|Nah]]
passages.cleanText:
**questionMark
Omolon: Yea... Hey, just putting it out there but... What if I'd go into that planet's orbit to turn back towards your direction? @eon_unhappy_ox
Eon doesn't like that idea at all.
Eon: I think it's just too risky. You might end up crashing the planet instead.

passages.name: Nah
passages.text:
**dialog
Omolon: Nah, I think I'll be fine. Look at it, it's kinda small anyway. I doubt it has a powerful gravitational pull. @eon_anxious_ox
Eon feels the stress rising in her body.
Eon: That's really not necessary. We saw each other, we had a good conversation. I'm sure we'll run into each other soon.
[[Ox|Try]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Omolon: Nah, I think I'll be fine. Look at it, it's kinda small anyway. I doubt it has a powerful gravitational pull. @eon_anxious_ox
Eon feels the stress rising in her body.
Eon: That's really not necessary. We saw each other, we had a good conversation. I'm sure we'll run into each other soon.

passages.name: Try
passages.text:
**exxMark
Omolon: Well, I'm doing it! Stop worrying, I'll be next to you soon. @eon_panic_ox
As she is getting further and further away, Eon is shouting behind her.
Eon: Please don't do this! I'm begging you!
Omolon: Chillax! I'll be fine!
[[Ox|Omolon]]
passages.cleanText:
**exxMark
Omolon: Well, I'm doing it! Stop worrying, I'll be next to you soon. @eon_panic_ox
As she is getting further and further away, Eon is shouting behind her.
Eon: Please don't do this! I'm begging you!
Omolon: Chillax! I'll be fine!

passages.name: Proof
passages.text:
**ellipsis
Eon: All I am saying is that we don't have any proof pro or against it. @eon_disagree_eagle
There is silence again. This time it is not the travel distance.
Eon realizes that made Omolon uncomfrotable.
[[Eagle|Farewell]]
passages.cleanText:
**ellipsis
Eon: All I am saying is that we don't have any proof pro or against it. @eon_disagree_eagle
There is silence again. This time it is not the travel distance.
Eon realizes that made Omolon uncomfrotable.

passages.name: Similar
passages.text:
**cry
Eon's heart is crushed by this news. @eon_cry_ox
Eon: Poor Jepara... I mean, it is just heartbreaking news. But I think I understand how she must have felt... I feel really lonely sometimes. I feel extremely lucky to run into you just now. You keep me company, even if it is for a short time. You know...
Omolon: Likewise girl, likewise! I wish we can travel together for longer.
[[Ox|Wonderful]]
[[Eagle|Unlikely]]
passages.cleanText:
**cry
Eon's heart is crushed by this news. @eon_cry_ox
Eon: Poor Jepara... I mean, it is just heartbreaking news. But I think I understand how she must have felt... I feel really lonely sometimes. I feel extremely lucky to run into you just now. You keep me company, even if it is for a short time. You know...
Omolon: Likewise girl, likewise! I wish we can travel together for longer.

passages.name: Omolon
passages.text:
**eyes
Eon keeps looking back to see if Omolon is doing okay. @eon_anxious_ox
Eon: I hope she knows what she is doing. 
As Omolon finally entering the orbit, Eon holds her breath.
[[Ox|Crash]]
passages.cleanText:
**eyes
Eon keeps looking back to see if Omolon is doing okay. @eon_anxious_ox
Eon: I hope she knows what she is doing. 
As Omolon finally entering the orbit, Eon holds her breath.

passages.name: Crash
passages.text:
**explosion
After a little while, Eon sees a little bright dot appearing on the dark gray planet. @eon_panic_ox
Eon: Oh shit! Oh no. NO!
A couple moments later, Omolon's unfortunate scream arrives to Eon's ears.
[[Ox|Tears]]
[[Lion|Grieving]]
passages.cleanText:
**explosion
After a little while, Eon sees a little bright dot appearing on the dark gray planet. @eon_panic_ox
Eon: Oh shit! Oh no. NO!
A couple moments later, Omolon's unfortunate scream arrives to Eon's ears.

passages.name: Tears
passages.text:
**cry
Eon bursts into tears. @eon_cry_ox
Eon: I told her not to do it! I told her! Why didn't she listen to me? Why?
It feels so shitty when your friend just dies.
Eon cries for hours, days, or maybe years. Who knows, time works differently in empty space, I guess.
[[Ox|Depression]]
passages.cleanText:
**cry
Eon bursts into tears. @eon_cry_ox
Eon: I told her not to do it! I told her! Why didn't she listen to me? Why?
It feels so shitty when your friend just dies.
Eon cries for hours, days, or maybe years. Who knows, time works differently in empty space, I guess.

passages.name: Grieving
passages.text:
**cry
Eon: Ah! The unfortunate thing happened. Poor Omolon! @eon_cry_lion
She feels sad at first.
Then, after some grieving period, she starts to see things differently.
[[Lion|Tried]]
passages.cleanText:
**cry
Eon: Ah! The unfortunate thing happened. Poor Omolon! @eon_cry_lion
She feels sad at first.
Then, after some grieving period, she starts to see things differently.

passages.name: Depression
passages.text:
**ellipsis
Eon is pulled into depressive thoughts. @eon_depressed_ox
She starts questioning her existence. 
Eon: Is there any point of me existing and drifting in the space? Where am I even going? What's my destination?
[[Ox|Pain]]
passages.cleanText:
**ellipsis
Eon is pulled into depressive thoughts. @eon_depressed_ox
She starts questioning her existence. 
Eon: Is there any point of me existing and drifting in the space? Where am I even going? What's my destination?

passages.name: Questioning
passages.text:
**hourglass
Jepara's story triggers thoughts in Eon's mind. @eon_think_eagle
She questions the purpose of her existence, her loneliness, drifting forever, and things you'd consider only if you exist as a meteor.
Eon: I am only passing time. Counting days. And I don't even know how long the days are.
[[Human|Dreaming]]
[[Eagle|Dwelling]]
passages.cleanText:
**hourglass
Jepara's story triggers thoughts in Eon's mind. @eon_think_eagle
She questions the purpose of her existence, her loneliness, drifting forever, and things you'd consider only if you exist as a meteor.
Eon: I am only passing time. Counting days. And I don't even know how long the days are.

passages.name: Dreaming
passages.text:
**think
She starts dreaming of planets. What it would be like to exist on a planet, maybe having more freedom to choose destinations and goals. And maybe she wouldn't be as lonely.@eon_dream_human
Eon: I wonder is Jepara is still alive? If so, is she still a meteor or something else? Does she have a better life?
But there is even something more important than that.
Eon: I wonder if she has company on that planet.
[[Human|Decision]]
passages.cleanText:
**think
She starts dreaming of planets. What it would be like to exist on a planet, maybe having more freedom to choose destinations and goals. And maybe she wouldn't be as lonely.@eon_dream_human
Eon: I wonder is Jepara is still alive? If so, is she still a meteor or something else? Does she have a better life?
But there is even something more important than that.
Eon: I wonder if she has company on that planet.

passages.name: Dwelling
Decision
passages.text:
**bluePlanet
So at some point in time, she finally makes the decision to give it a try.
Eon: If I die, I'll be dying for my dream. And if not, a worthwhile life will be mine. eon_determined_human
After some thinking she picks a pale blue planet.
[[Human|Falling]]
passages.cleanText:
**bluePlanet
So at some point in time, she finally makes the decision to give it a try.
Eon: If I die, I'll be dying for my dream. And if not, a worthwhile life will be mine. eon_determined_human
After some thinking she picks a pale blue planet.

passages.name: Falling
passages.text:
**falling
Eon goes straight into the planet. @eon_falling_human
Her stress level is rising fast. She is scared.
As she gets closer, she starts to question her decision.
Eon imagines the moment of hitting and just disappearing in pain.
Does she want to risk her existence?
As she is questioning further her decision, she gets to the point where beyond that she just can't go back anymore.
Eon: Okay, this is it. Should I keep going or go back?
[[Human|Back]]
[[Lion|Brave]]
passages.cleanText:
**falling
Eon goes straight into the planet. @eon_falling_human
Her stress level is rising fast. She is scared.
As she gets closer, she starts to question her decision.
Eon imagines the moment of hitting and just disappearing in pain.
Does she want to risk her existence?
As she is questioning further her decision, she gets to the point where beyond that she just can't go back anymore.
Eon: Okay, this is it. Should I keep going or go back?

passages.name: Back
passages.text:
**brokenHeart
At that moment it just doesn't make sense anymore. @eon_anxious_human
She pushes herself outside of the path with a rush.
If she had a heart, it would have beat so fast.
After some moment of shaking and trembling, she is finally back into the endless void.
[[Human|Forever]]
passages.cleanText:
**brokenHeart
At that moment it just doesn't make sense anymore. @eon_anxious_human
She pushes herself outside of the path with a rush.
If she had a heart, it would have beat so fast.
After some moment of shaking and trembling, she is finally back into the endless void.

passages.name: Brave
passages.text:
**exxMark
Eon: I put so much thinking into this decision and came all this way. Because I was unhappy and unsatisfied. There is nothing worthwhile for me to go back. I am quitting my miserable life. @eon_excited_lion
She passes the check point.
And suddenly she just feels free.
Eon: Woo Hoo! For better or worse, here I come! Freedom!
[[Lion|Surface]]
passages.cleanText:
**exxMark
Eon: I put so much thinking into this decision and came all this way. Because I was unhappy and unsatisfied. There is nothing worthwhile for me to go back. I am quitting my miserable life. @eon_excited_lion
She passes the check point.
And suddenly she just feels free.
Eon: Woo Hoo! For better or worse, here I come! Freedom!

passages.name: Farewell
passages.text:
**hi
Omolon: Anyway friend, forces are against us as usual. It was really nice to see you! Take care until next time! @eon_float_eagle
And she is driven away like that.
[[Eagle|Questioning]]
passages.cleanText:
**hi
Omolon: Anyway friend, forces are against us as usual. It was really nice to see you! Take care until next time! @eon_float_eagle
And she is driven away like that.

passages.name: Forever
passages.text:
**hourglass
Eon keeps traveling the void for unknown ages, looking for some meaning or a friendly face. Once in a while she dreams of crushing into the planet and living a different life. @eon_depressed_human
Uncertainty can be very much alike to forever, right my friend?
And if you look up on a clear night in the sky, maybe she is still traveling out there, dreaming of making a different decision that day.
@end
passages.cleanText:
**hourglass
Eon keeps traveling the void for unknown ages, looking for some meaning or a friendly face. Once in a while she dreams of crushing into the planet and living a different life. @eon_depressed_human
Uncertainty can be very much alike to forever, right my friend?
And if you look up on a clear night in the sky, maybe she is still traveling out there, dreaming of making a different decision that day.
@end

passages.name: Pain
passages.text:
**hourglass
That is how she learned about pain, but she didn't know the name then. @eon_depressed_ox
So she drift into the void for ages, and maybe even today.
Time doesn't heal, just makes her numb. Makes her forget.
And she drifts until the day the forces will pull her to the end. Until that day, it's just counting days.
@end
passages.cleanText:
**hourglass
That is how she learned about pain, but she didn't know the name then. @eon_depressed_ox
So she drift into the void for ages, and maybe even today.
Time doesn't heal, just makes her numb. Makes her forget.
And she drifts until the day the forces will pull her to the end. Until that day, it's just counting days.
@end

passages.name: Surface
passages.text:
**fire
As she is approaching the surface, her body starts to burn. @eon_falling_lion
She gets smaller and smaller. 
Eon: I am fine! I never felt so alive before!
A part of her feels scared as she is getting closer to the surface, but she doesn't regret her decision. Not even a tiny bit.
[[Lion|Hit]]
passages.cleanText:
**fire
As she is approaching the surface, her body starts to burn. @eon_falling_lion
She gets smaller and smaller. 
Eon: I am fine! I never felt so alive before!
A part of her feels scared as she is getting closer to the surface, but she doesn't regret her decision. Not even a tiny bit.

passages.name: Hit
passages.text:
**explosion
Forces of gravity keeps pulling her stronger and stronger. @eon_cheer_lion
She is screaming with joy.
Eon: Life! I am here! Take me in!
So she finally hits the ground. She feels her body exploding into pieces.
[[Lion|Slow]]
passages.cleanText:
**explosion
Forces of gravity keeps pulling her stronger and stronger. @eon_cheer_lion
She is screaming with joy.
Eon: Life! I am here! Take me in!
So she finally hits the ground. She feels her body exploding into pieces.

passages.name: Slow
passages.text:
**heart
Eon was not dead. However, life didn't happened as fast as she expected. @eon_lookAround_lion
She remained patient. It started with molecules. Then slowly, she found herself exiting in unicellular organisms, then more complex ones in time. Reptiles, mammals, plants. And humans finally.
[[Lion|Book]]
passages.cleanText:
**heart
Eon was not dead. However, life didn't happened as fast as she expected. @eon_lookAround_lion
She remained patient. It started with molecules. Then slowly, she found herself exiting in unicellular organisms, then more complex ones in time. Reptiles, mammals, plants. And humans finally.

passages.name: Book
passages.text:
~~
**blueFig
Today, as Eon lies in her bed, eating a delicious rare blue fig, she is full of existential thoughts. @eon_happy_lion
She is just grateful for her decision back in the day.
She remembers a line she read in a book. 
The beauty of a living thing is not the atoms that go into it, but the way those atoms are put together, she tells herself.
@end
passages.cleanText:
~~
**blueFig
Today, as Eon lies in her bed, eating a delicious rare blue fig, she is full of existential thoughts. @eon_happy_lion
She is just grateful for her decision back in the day.
She remembers a line she read in a book. 
The beauty of a living thing is not the atoms that go into it, but the way those atoms are put together, she tells herself.
@end

passages.name: Tried
passages.text:
**ellipsis
Eon: It is actually really impressive that she put the effort to change her life for better. That is quite inspiring. She died for something that was important to her. @eon_approve_lion
So, the death of Omolon and their last conversation starts to invade Eon's mind more and more.
[[Lion|Unsure]]
passages.cleanText:
**ellipsis
Eon: It is actually really impressive that she put the effort to change her life for better. That is quite inspiring. She died for something that was important to her. @eon_approve_lion
So, the death of Omolon and their last conversation starts to invade Eon's mind more and more.

passages.name: Unsure
passages.text:
**ellipsis
Eon: Maybe she is not death. Maybe she just turned into another being. Walking on a planet, enjoying company, free of gravitational prison. @eon_determined_lion
The idea that she is transformed into another form of existence seems more and more possible to Eon.
[[Human|Dreaming]]
[[Lion|Risk]]
passages.cleanText:
**ellipsis
Eon: Maybe she is not death. Maybe she just turned into another being. Walking on a planet, enjoying company, free of gravitational prison. @eon_determined_lion
The idea that she is transformed into another form of existence seems more and more possible to Eon.

passages.name: Risk
passages.text:
**bluePlanet
Eon comes to a point that taking a risk to see it for herself seems worth it.
In the end, hers is not life. She is just a lonely meteor, drifting in the void with no purpose. All she does is waiting for something, but she doesn't even know what that is.
So one day, she finally makes the decision to crash herself into a planet.
She picks a pale blue dot as her target.
[[Lion|Fall]]
passages.cleanText:
**bluePlanet
Eon comes to a point that taking a risk to see it for herself seems worth it.
In the end, hers is not life. She is just a lonely meteor, drifting in the void with no purpose. All she does is waiting for something, but she doesn't even know what that is.
So one day, she finally makes the decision to crash herself into a planet.
She picks a pale blue dot as her target.

passages.name: Fall
passages.text:
**falling
Eon goes straight into the planet. @eon_falling_lion
Her stress level is rising fast. She is scared.
As she gets closer, she starts to question her decision.
Eon imagines the moment of hitting and just disappearing in pain.
Does she want to risk her existence?
As she is questioning further her decision, she gets to the point where beyond that she just can't go back anymore.
Eon: Okay, this is it. Should I keep going or go back?
[[Human|Back]]
[[Lion|Brave]]
passages.cleanText:
**falling
Eon goes straight into the planet. @eon_falling_lion
Her stress level is rising fast. She is scared.
As she gets closer, she starts to question her decision.
Eon imagines the moment of hitting and just disappearing in pain.
Does she want to risk her existence?
As she is questioning further her decision, she gets to the point where beyond that she just can't go back anymore.
Eon: Okay, this is it. Should I keep going or go back?
